	The Accountant is responsible for managing financial records, ensuring accurate reporting, and supporting financial decision-making within the hospitality operation.
	This role involves overseeing daily accounting activities, monitoring costs, ensuring compliance with regulations, and collaborating with management to improve profitability and operational efficiency.


Job Description / Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate financial records, including general ledger, accounts payable, and accounts receivable
	Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly financial reports (P&amp;L, balance sheets, cash flow)
	Monitor revenue from rooms, food &amp; beverage, events, and other hospitality services
	Reconcile bank statements, POS systems, and property management systems (PMS)
	Manage payroll processing and employee-related financial records
	Control costs by tracking expenses, inventory, and supplier invoices
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations, audits, and internal controls
	Coordinate with department heads to analyze financial performance
	Support external auditors and regulatory inspections

	Knowledge of hospitality revenue streams (rooms, F&amp;B, events, services)
	Familiarity with local tax laws, payroll regulations, and compliance standards

	Strong knowledge of accounting principles and financial reporting
	Experience with hospitality accounting systems (PMS, POS, ERP software)
	Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Attention to detail and high level of accuracy
	Ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Understanding of cost control in food &amp; beverage and hotel operations

N250,000 - N500,000 / Month.

Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Applications to:&nbsp;freshcountyimp@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Accountant Job at Fresh County Limited




        
    

        
        Fresh County Limited is a health food store that produce healthy meals, fresh juice and smoothies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Accountant is responsible for managing financial records, ensuring accurate reporting, and supporting financial decision-making within the hospitality operation.
	This role involves overseeing daily accounting activities, monitoring costs, ensuring compliance with regulations, and collaborating with management to improve profitability and operational efficiency.


Job Description / Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate financial records, including general ledger, accounts payable, and accounts receivable
	Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly financial reports (P&L, balance sheets, cash flow)
	Monitor revenue from rooms, food & beverage, events, and other hospitality services
	Reconcile bank statements, POS systems, and property management systems (PMS)
	Manage payroll processing and employee-related financial records
	Control costs by tracking expenses, inventory, and supplier invoices
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations, audits, and internal controls
	Coordinate with department heads to analyze financial performance
	Support external auditors and regulatory inspections


Requirements / Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field with 2–5 years of accounting experience, preferably in the hospitality industry
	Knowledge of hospitality revenue streams (rooms, F&B, events, services)
	Familiarity with local tax laws, payroll regulations, and compliance standards


Required Skills:


	Strong knowledge of accounting principles and financial reporting
	Experience with hospitality accounting systems (PMS, POS, ERP software)
	Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Attention to detail and high level of accuracy
	Ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Understanding of cost control in food & beverage and hotel operations


Salary
N250,000 - N500,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Applications to: freshcountyimp@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more information contact the recruiter on: 08160759272.
